src:
CPI das Fake News quer ouvir general Heleno sobre “gabinete do ódio”

06 Nov 2019, 13:29

A CPI das Fake News vai analisar um requerimento para convocar o general Augusto Heleno, diz a Crusoé.
A turminha quer ouvi-lo sobre o tal “gabinete do ódio”, que funcionaria dentro do Palácio do Planalto.
Leia a nota completa aqui.
text:
Fake News CPI wants to hear General Heleno about “hate office”

Nov 06 2019, 13:29

Fake News CPI will consider a request to summon General Augusto Heleno, Crusoe says.
The gang wants to hear from you about such a “hate cabinet” that would work inside the Planalto Palace.
Read the full note here.
